DataManagement::DataElement::name = name
DataManagement::DataElement::storageLocation = storage location
DataManagement::DataElement::strategy = storage strategy
DataManagement::DataElement::throughput = strategy time line
DataManagement::DataElement::constraints = SLA constraints
DataManagement::DataSource::host = physical data source
DataManagement::DataSource::input = input fields
DataManagement::dataSources = configured data sources
DataManagement::DataSink::output = output fields
DataManagement::dataSinks = configured data sinks
